models.predict_train_model¶

Functions

run_models(Xtrain, ytrain, Xtest, ytest, …) Runs a list of models.
models.predict_train_model.run_models(Xtrain, ytrain, Xtest, ytest, model_dict)[source]¶

Runs a list of models.

Runs a list of models defined in model_dict.

Parameters:
  • Xtrain (numpy.ndarray) – training data
  • ytrain (numpy.ndarray) – training target data
  • Xtest (numpy.ndarray) – test data
  • ytrain – training test data
  • model_dict (list) – dictionary of models to run
